Label.en: The high steel and glass structures were called 'Baltard Pavilions'. Parisians loved them!
Label.fr: Les parisiens adorèrent ! Ces hautes structures de métal et de verre furent connues sous le nom de 'Pavillons Baltard'
Label.es: The high steel and glass structures were called 'Baltard Pavilions'
Label.zh: The high steel and glass structures were called 'Baltard Pavilions'

Label.en: Ten were built between 1852 and 1889... over 300 houses were demolished to make space
Label.fr: Dix pavillons furent construits entre 1852 et 1889... et plus de 300 maisons détruites pour faire de la place
Label.es: Ten were built between 1852 and 1889... over 300 houses were demolished to make space!
Label.zh: Ten were built between 1852 and 1889... over 300 houses were demolished to make space!

Label.en: They were strongly inspired by the proposal of the leading unlucky competitor for the planning competition - Hector Horeau, who also managed to lose the competition for London's Crystal Palace a few years later
Label.fr: Ils s'inpiraient fortement de la proposition d'un des principaux compétiteurs pour le projet  - Hector Horeau, qui perdit aussi de peu l'appel à projets pour le Crystal Palace de l'exposition universelle de Londres quelques années plus tard !

Label.zh: They were strongly inspired by the proposal of the leading unlucky competitor for the planning competition - Hector Horeau, who also managed to lose the competition for London's Crystal Palace a few years later
